name: Verify PACT interactions UserConsumer - A request to create a new user

statusDetails.message:
UserConsumer - Upon A request to create a new user 
Failures:

1) Verifying a pact between UserConsumer and UserProvider - A request to create a new user: has status code 201

    1.1) status: expected status of 201 but was 404

    1.2) header: Expected header 'Content-Type' to have value 'application/json' but was 'text/html'

    1.3) body-content-type: Expected a body of 'application/json' but the actual content type was 'text/html'
statusDetails.trace:
